power.title: Clap of Thunder
power.fluff: Raising your blade, you send out a clap of thunder that sends your foes sprawling as noise cascades over them
power.section: Attack: Close burst 1 Close wave 2 Each creature in the burst or wave Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone.
Miss: Half damage if the target is marked by your arcane aegis class power.

power.title: Dazing Rebuke
power.fluff: Your sword swing unleashes a barrage of nettling darts of force that punish a foe for attacking your allies
power.section: Aegis of Shielding: You can use this power as an immediate interrupt. The target can finish the triggering attack on a hit, even though it becomes dazed and might be out of actions.
Trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits or misses an ally
Attack: Ranged 5 the triggering enemy Intelligence vs. Will
Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is dazed until the start of the currently acting creature's next turn.
Aegis of Shielding: The target also takes a penalty to all damage rolls while it remains dazed. The penalty equals 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Miss: If the target is marked by you, it takes force damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and cannot make reactive strikes until the start of the currently acting creature's next turn.
Aegis of Shielding: The target takes half the penalty to damage rolls. If the target is marked by you, it cannot make any triggered attacks instead of only reactive strikes.

power.title: Echoes of Sword Magic
power.fluff: You tap into the magic of your failed strike to unleash a mighty barrage of thunder
power.section: Requirement: You must have used a Swordmage attack power this turn and missed all targets with it.
Attack: Close wave 3 each creature in the burst Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.
The target counts as being marked by your arcane aegis until the end of your next turn.
Miss: If you used a Swordmage Lightning attack power this turn, you deal thunder damage equal to your 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Electrified Lash
power.fluff: You point your sword into the air, and cruel talons of white lightning reach out toward your foes
power.section: Attack: Close burst 2 each enemy in the burst Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Miss: If the target is marked by you, it takes lightning damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Evoker's Summons
power.fluff: You violoently summon a foe to your side
power.section: Attack: Close burst 3 each enemy in the burst Intelligence vs. Will

Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you teleport the target to a space adjacent to you. If there is not enough space adjacent to you, you teleport the target as close to you as possible instead.
Miss: You teleport the target 1 square towards you, as if you had pulled it.

power.title: Fettering Aegis
power.fluff: The magic of your aegis creates an invisiblew tether between you and your enemy, preventing it from escaping
power.section: Trigger: An enemy that you can see and that is marked by your arcane aegis willingly moves away from you
Attack: Ranged 10 the triggering enemy Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you pull the target up to 8 squares. You must pull the target to a space adjacent to you if you can.
The target stops moving, though it can resume moving if it has further actions remaining.
Aegis of Ensnarement: The target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.
Miss: You pull the target half the distance, and it can resume moving after the pull.

power.title: Flamewall Strike
power.fluff: With a mighty sweep of your blade, dancing tongues of arcane fire rise from the ground at the feet of your foes
power.section: Effect: Area wall 5 within 1 square The wall creates a zone of leaping flames until the end of your next turn. The origin square of the wall does not need to be within 1 square as long as at least one square is. The wall is 1 square high.

Any creature that enters the wall's space or ends its turn there takes fire damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

power.title: Rejuvenating Strike
power.fluff: Your attack draws life from your foe's injury and instills you with renewed energy
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
You can choose in which order you want to resolve the hits
Hit (AC): 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Hit: (Fortitude): You can expend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your recovery value.
Miss: You can expend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to half your recovery value.
Effect: If you expended a healing surge, you gain a benefit depending on your Arcane Aegis class feature choice:

Aegis of Assault: The attack you make as part of your aegis of assault class power deals additional damage until the end of your next turn. The additional damage equals one-half the number of healing surges you have expended (minimum +1).

Aegis of Ensnarement: You gain a bonus to attack rolls against the target for attacks the target triggers by willingly moving before the end of your next turn. The bonus equals one-half the number of healing surges you have expended (minimum +1).

Aegis of Shielding: Your aegis of shielding class power reduces additional damage until the end of your next turn. The additional reduction equals one-half the number of healing surges you have expended (minimum 1).

power.title: Shatterblade
power.fluff: In the blink of an eye, your bonded weapon shatters into thousands of fragments that cut into your foes, and the weapon the reforms in your hand
power.section: Requirement: You must make this attack using your bonded weapon.
Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Hit (AC): 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Hit (Reflex): Each creature adjacent to the target (other than you) takes damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
Miss (Both): 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Spikes of Agony
power.fluff: Your strike leaves shards of pure force piercing your enemy's flesh, rending it if it moves
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Hit (AC): 3[W] force damage, or 3[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage if you also hit the target's Fortitude defense.
Hit (Fortitude): 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus force damage if you didn't hit the target's AC.

The first time the target moves before the start of your next turn, it takes force damage equal to 5 + your [Strength or Constitution] modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus, or half this amount if the movement was forced movement.
Miss (Fortitude): The first time the target willingly moves before the start of your next turn, it takes half the force damage.
Special (Aegis of Assault): When you use your aegis of assault class power, you can use this attack in place of the melee basic attack.
If you do, the damage when you hit AC is reduced by -1[W] and the force damage from movement happens the first time the target moves before the start of the currently acting creature's next turn.

power.title: Watchful Strike
power.fluff: As you strike your foe, you palce another foe under your aegis
power.section: Prerequisite: You must have the arcane aegis class power.
Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC
Hit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Miss: 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage if the target is marked by you.
Effect: Choose one enemy within 5 squares of you other than the target. If the target is marked by your arcane aegis, you can choose one enemy within 10 squares instead.
The chosen enemy counts as being marked by your arcane aegis class power until the end of your next turn.
